login.usernameMin: Username must be at least 5 characters  long
login.passwordValidation: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one lowercase letter, uppercase letter, number and special character
login.lastNameValidation: Last Name must contain only letters
login.credentialsErrorMsg: Enter valid credentials and try again.

add-document.title: Title
add-document.titleMin: Title must be at least 3 characters long
add-document.titleMax: Title must be at most 50 characters long
add-document.briefMin: Brief description must be at least 3 characters long
add-document.briefMax: Brief description must be at most 50 characters long
add-document.descriptionMax: Description must be at most 255 characters long
add-document.successTitle: Document was successfully created and is awaiting for acceptation
add-document.successMsg: Before acceptation only you can browse it.
